nodes.text: Tocneppil was a male once known by Han Solo and Chewbacca. Han and Chewbacca were apparently once partners with Tocneppil. According to Han, he was not a Corellian, and that he once couldn't find his ship during an adventure, due to him being drunk.
Tocneppil was also a friend of Lando Calrissian, and used to hop around the galaxy with him before Lando became the administrator of Bespin.
The name Tocneppil is a tuckerism for Andy Lippencot[source?], a close associate of Alan Dean Foster's.
